Electrical Health Check

Ensure the safety, efficiency, and reliability of your electrical system with Shaffer Construction's comprehensive electrical health assessments. Our expert technicians deliver top-tier inspections tailored to your home or business needs.

Why Schedule an Electrical Health Check?

Regular electrical inspections are vital for maintaining safety standards, preventing costly repairs, and optimizing energy efficiency. With our advanced assessment services, we identify potential issues before they escalate, safeguarding your property and loved ones.

What We Evaluate

  • Wiring integrity and safety
  • Electrical panel and breaker performance
  • Grounding and bonding quality
  • Capacity and load analysis
  • Lighting and outlets condition
  • Energy efficiency opportunities
  • Compliance with current safety standards

Our Electrical Health Check Process

  1. Initial Consultation: Understanding your electrical system and specific concerns.
  2. Comprehensive Inspection: Conducting a thorough examination of all relevant components.
  3. Detailed Report: Providing insights into system health, potential risks, and improvement recommendations.
  4. Follow-up & Recommendations: Offering tailored solutions to enhance safety and efficiency.
